RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduaзгo em Physics pela Universidade de Shahid Beheshti (2004), mestrado em High Energy Physics - University of Mazandaran (2006) e doutorado em Fнsica de Altas Energias pela Universidade de Shahid Beheshti (2013). Atualmente й professor adjunto da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco. Tem experiкncia na бrea de Fнsica, com кnfase em Fнsica das Partнculas Elementares e Campos, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: soliton, fermion-soliton systems, kink interactions, cosmic string, casimir energy, casimir effect at finite temperature.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: graduation at Physics from Universidade de Shahid Beheshti (2004), master's at High Energy Physics from University of Mazandaran (2006) and doctorate at Fнsica de Altas Energias from Universidade de Shahid Beheshti (2013). Has experience in Physics, focusing on Physics of Elementary Particles and Fields, acting on the following subjects: soliton, fermion-soliton systems, kink interactions, cosmic string, casimir energy, casimir effect at finite temperature.
